episodes.title: #56 Investigating incest, kidnapping, bio-fuel fraud, and the spread of polygamist cult "The Order" : Docu-Investigators Mat & Tawni Browning (A&E series "Secrets of Polygamy"
episodes.description: Mat and Tawni Browing spent years investigating, infiltrating, and rescuing girls from "The Order," a polygamist cult with hundreds of male members who marry their nieces, half-sisters, aunts, and first cousins in order to keep their blood line pure. "The Order" has been linked to crimes against children, kidnappings, multi-million dollar bio-fuel frauds, public corruption, and more.
